core:processNote.core:description:
Must be returning gift card tender and selected return tender is original tender to offer refund to original card.
Currently only supported for payment service.

Test for return original tender being used and gift card type is not already specified.
If selected tender is the original tender, then giftcardtype is identified from original details and automatic return to original card may be an option.
If selected tender is not the original tender, then we may need to identify gift card type from the tender in order to determine if payment service is to be used.
This action locates the original tender details.

Is selected tender the original tender?
If not (and we don't know a gift card type), call extension to see if we can get a gift card type from the tender.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Refund onto a gift card (NOT refund a gift card)

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: concat('Could not load Gift Card Type for Id ', giftCardTypeId )
